com.travelbank.knit.viewevents

Class ViewEventEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.travelbank.knit.viewevents.ViewEventEnv
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Poolable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdapterItemSelectedEvent, GenericEvent, KnitOnClickEvent, KnitOnFocusChangedEvent, KnitOnRefreshEvent, KnitOnSwitchToggleEvent, KnitTextChangedEvent, TabSelectedEvent

    public abstract class ViewEventEnv
extends java.lang.Object
implements Poolable
    View Event Environment. Contains all data for a view event such as the tag of the event that's fired.
